titleStmt.title: The pilgrimage to paradise, ioyned with the Countesse of Penbrookes loue, compiled in verse by Nicholas Breton Gentleman
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, by Ioseph Barnes, and are to be solde in Paules Church-yeard [, London, by Toby Cooke], at the signe of the Tygres head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Tygres head
